item.title: Tmux and Copy to Clipboard
item.description:
Problem: Automatic copy to clipboard doesn’t work

  • When ssh’d to a remote server
  • Running tmux
  • From a Ghostty terminal window

But does work:

  • When not running tmux, everything else the same.

Solution: On the remote server, update `~/.tmux.conf and add the line:

set -g allow-passthrough on

References:

  • GitHub Issue

item.title: Tmux, Ghostty, and Shift-Enter
item.description:
Problem: Shift-enter doesn’t work

  • When ssh’d to a remote server
  • Running tmux
  • From a Ghostty terminal window

But does work:

  • When not running tmux, everything else the same.

Solution: Update Ghostty settings and add the line:

keybind = shift+enter=text:\x1b\r

On the remote server, update `~/.tmux.conf and add the line:

set -s extended-keys on

References:

  • GitHub Issue

item.title: Certificates in Docker Containers
item.description:
If you’re using a minimal image, you might need to add ca-certificates:

FROM alpine AS certs
RUN apk add --no-cache ca-certificates
FROM scratch
COPY --from=certs /etc/ssl/certs/ca-certificates.crt /etc/ssl/certs/
COPY my-go-binary /
CMD ["/my-go-binary"]

item.title: Joining Python Paths
item.description:
Joining a directory with a leading slash doesn’t necessarily do what you’d think.

import os
os.path.join("/tmp/", "other")
# '/tmp/other'
os.path.join("/tmp/", "other")
# '/tmp/other'
os.path.join("/tmp/", "/other")
# '/other' (?!)

import pathlib
tmp = pathlib.Path("/tmp")
other = pathlib.Path("other")
tmp / other
# PosixPath('/tmp/other')
other = pathlib.Path("/other")
tmp / other
# PosixPath('/other')
